articles.author: Christopher Clarey
articles.title: U.S. Open Will Allow Russian and Belarusian Tennis Players to Compete - The New York Times
articles.description: The move leaves Wimbledon as the only Grand Slam tournament to bar Russians and Belarusians in the wake of the invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content: For now, no other tour events outside Britain have followed Wimbledons lead, although tennis authorities did move swiftly after the invasion of Ukraine to bar Russian and Belarusian teams from compet… [+1411 chars]
